terms: **TEXT OF AMENDMENTS TO THE BY-LAWS, AS AMENDED AND RESTATED,**
**and shall perform such other duties as may from time to time be requested by the Board of Directors**

**general and active management of the business of the Corporation, subject, however, to the control of the Board of Directors, shall have the power to execute bonds, mortgages and other contracts requiring a seal, under the seal of the Corporation, except in cases where the signing and execution thereof shall be expressly delegated by the Board of Directors, or by these By-laws, to some other officer or agent of the Corporation**
**not be a current or former executive officer**
